attributes.action: Keep the catering course at North Notts College in Worksop from shutting down.
attributes.additional_details: As a small team of students, we built a bond between each other and tutors throughout this year. However, with this course being cancelled, it would affect all of our future's as its now made our tutors jobless, and only a couple of us could travel to another college to continue the same course, so we need help to get the funding back for this course.
attributes.background: Recently we found out ONLINE that our course will be cancelled next year, as the students who want to progress further in this career, the catering students, are asking you, to help us keep the catering course in Worksop North Notts College from being cancelled and to have the funding behind it.

rejection.details: This is a decision for your college, not the UK Government or Parliament.
